about_the_game: Dragon Mine is a game about gold miner who is trapped in the gold mine with unknown creatures: some are neutral, some are aggressive, some are annoying. Go through the numerous mazes and try to get to the cave full of gold waiting at the end, but remember - the journey won't be easy. Think fast and move precisely to get to the exit - any delay may result in the escape portal to be covered with mysterious water, blocking your way out.
detailed_description: Dragon Mine is a game about gold miner who is trapped in the gold mine with unknown creatures: some are neutral, some are aggressive, some are annoying. Go through the numerous mazes and try to get to the cave full of gold waiting at the end, but remember - the journey won't be easy. Think fast and move precisely to get to the exit - any delay may result in the escape portal to be covered with mysterious water, blocking your way out.
name: Dragon Mine Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB DX10 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 / AMD FX-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 760 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: Try not to die too often while running through the numerous mazes to get to the cave full of gold.
